page.title: Greetings Between People of the Same Gender

property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Members of the Pakistan military greeting U.S. service members

note.text: To greet a Pakistani of the same gender, smile, make eye contact, and shake hands using your right hand.

In Pakistan, it’s normal for handshakes to linger. Hand holding between people of the same gender is also common during conversations. To avoid causing offense, don’t pull away until your counterpart does. Try to put any discomfort aside and remember that it is simply a sign of friendship.
As friendships develop, hugs are common in greetings between people of the same gender.
